8.title: Parting Gift
8.plot: Mr. D has to provide the graduating class with a "Parting Gift". He decides that they will make the world biggest "fun box", that will be opened in 20 yrs. Ms Mason visits her Alma Mater with one of her students.

1.title: Pilot
1.plot: Gerry Duncan has finally gotten a full time teaching position at the prestigious Xavier academy after years of substituting.

2.title: 24 Hour Famine
2.plot: Gerry volunteers to help staff the 24 Hour Famine event in an effort to spend time with Xavier's hot guidance counselor, Eva MacPhee.

3.title: Grade the Teacher
3.plot: Gerry embarks on a campaign to get more positive reviews than Dwyer on gradetheteacher.com.

4.title: Exam Week
4.plot: It's exam time at Xavier Academy and Gerry is convinced that he will catch a few students who are known to cheat on their exams.

5.title: Bully Awareness Week
5.plot: It's Bully Awareness Week at Xavier Academy.

6.title: The Dance
6.plot: Gerry organizes a dance fundraiser to cover some costs for the girls basketball team.

7.title: Job Opportunity
7.plot: When a job opens up in the phys ed department, Gerry sees his chance at his dream job.

8.title: Guest Speaker
8.plot: Gerry needs to find a guest speaker for Career Day, Robert has a fraternity reunion.

9.title: Quiz Cup
9.plot: Lisa takes over the school's Quiz Cup academic team, and Gerry 'helps' her.

10.title: Field Trip
10.plot: Gerry helps Bobbi supervise her Grade 5/6 field trip to the museum, while Jeff and Robert cover his classes back at Xavier.

11.title: The Basketball Diaries
11.plot: Can Gerry score his first win of the basketball season?

12.title: Charity Day
12.plot: Gerry hosts a boxing match at the school's annual Charity Day.

1.title: Gerry's Evaluation
1.plot: When Gerry is evaluated by a member of the board, he must go out of his way to prove that he is great at his job, or risk severe punishment.

2.title: Late Shift
2.plot: Gerry takes a second job at Barrels to pay for a new car but struggles to juggle both.

3.title: World Religions
3.plot: Gerry's 'World Religions' unit goes off course when he brings his personal views into the classroom.

4.title: Overnight Trip
4.plot: Gerry concocts a scheme to get his class to go to Boston so that he and Bill can watch a Celtics game.

5.title: The Crush
5.plot: Gerry develops a crush on the Scottish mother of one of his most annoying students.

6.title: The Other Woman
6.plot: When Bobbi and her long-term boyfriend Craig break up again, Gerry is there for the rebound - Craig's rebound.

7.title: The Date
7.plot: Airs Wednesday 27th February. In gearing up for his big date with Jean McGrory, Gerry is dismissive of Trudy's dating advice.

8.title: Gerry's Favourite Couple
8.plot: Xavier's favourite senior couple, Sean and Miranda ('Searanda'), are on the rocks. Seeing himself in Sean, Gerry decides to meddle in their relationship - they have to stay together or Gerry will suffer a deep personal loss.

9.title: Poker Night
9.plot: When Gerry comes across a down and out Daniel Negreanu, he orchestrates a staff poker night in order to get Daniel back on his feet.

10.title: Staff Retreat
10.plot: The staff are involved in an elaborate trust game that accidentally reveals some of their darkest secrets.

11.title: Culture Day
11.plot: Culture Day at Xavier and each teacher has been asked to model their classroom after a country. Gerry pushes for Scotland, only to find that Dwyer already has it.

12.title: Strip Club
12.plot: Gerry suspects that Dwyer is moonlighting as a stripper and there's only one way to find out for sure. Gerry and Simon are going to spend a night at the strip club...an all male strip club.

13.title: Slam Dunk
13.plot: Gerry tries to convince Bobbi to give him a senior boys basketball team next season. Robert learns that his year end evaluation came with one complaint.

1.title: Parent Teacher Night
1.plot: When Mr. D has only one opportunity to meet Paul Henderson and have his priceless Team Canada jersey signed, he won't let Xavier Academy's parent teacher night get in the way.

2.title: Old School
2.plot: Gerry decides he's going to make an impression on the runway of Lisa's faculty fashion show. Robert and Leung team up to find the vandal who has been defacing staff pictures.

3.title: Donor Dinner
3.plot: When Gerry finds out that Robert is trying to charm Xavier Academy's most generous philanthropist into continuing her support, Gerry decides he's going to show up Robert.

4.title: Assistant Leung
4.plot: Gerry is forced to appoint his arch nemesis Mr. Leung as his new assistant coach. His attempts to put Leung in his place as his subordinate end up backfiring.

5.title: Food Drive
5.plot: It's Food Drive Month at Xavier Academy, and Gerry is determined to make sure he wins the prize for being the teacher with the class that contributes the most food.

6.title: Gerry Gets Gym
6.plot: When Gerry is asked to temporarily fill in for an absent phys-ed teacher, he aggressively pursues what he sees as an "audition" to make a permanent move into the gymnasium.

7.title: Self Defence
7.plot: Gerry decides to "help" Bobbi with her girls' self defense class, but ends up feeling emasculated when it becomes obvious that she is able to physically dominate him.

8.title: Graduation
8.plot: After Gerry has a positive interview for a position with Xavier's main rival school, he attempts to use it as leverage with Principal Callaghan.

1.title: Mafia Dad
1.plot: Gerry has the chance to coach the Varsity Boys' Basketball team but ends up in an awkward position when an over eager gift bearing dad insists that a reluctant Gerry should let his son play.

2.title: Staff Hangover
2.plot: During a school assembly, Xavier teachers have flashbacks of the previous night's staff party where some members let a little too much lose. Xavier has a new Librarian with an unusual name.

3.title: President Jimmy
3.plot: Gerry becomes unexpectedly embroiled in the school's student council election and is forced to seek the help of an old foe.

4.title: Callaghan's Daughter
4.plot: Callaghan's daughter is in town visiting, and after seeing her old graduation photo, Gerry wants take her out on a date.

5.title: Dating Maya Student
5.plot: Gerry's former pupil, Maya is back at Xavier as a student teacher and Gerry is having difficulty accepting her as an adult.

6.title: Short Stocked
6.plot: Gerry and Bill's house they rent is up for sale and Gerry uses the advice of a market-savvy student raise enough money for a down payment.

7.title: Corporal Punishment
7.plot: Gerry's father Francis visits Xavier, and Gerry decides to take a page from his father's book when dealing with an insubordinate student.

8.title: Lockdown
8.plot: After encountering an attractive police officer during a lock-down drill, Gerry is determined to see her again. Bobbi does her best to end her recurring fling with Robert, while Simon shows Frank how he could use science to protect Xavier.

9.title: Gerry's Kid
9.plot: Gerry bumps into an old fling and her daughter and becomes convinced he's met the child he never knew he had. Robert prepares for his chess club's 20 year reunion.

10.title: Teacher Conference
10.plot: Gerry meets an attractive woman at Barrel's and drags Lisa with him to a teacher conference in Atlantic City to find her.

11.title: Coaching Prospects
11.plot: Gerry's star player is being scouted by Syracuse University, and Gerry wants to come along as part of a package deal.

12.title: Bizarro
12.plot: Something very strange is happening at Xavier Academy. The day to day goings on of Gerry and the rest of the staff have been completely reversed.

13.title: Coach of the Year
13.plot: Gerry figures he's a sure thing for the school's Coach of the Year award after his team wins the city championship.

1.title: Gerry's Redemption
1.plot: After losing his Xavier Academy job last season over the unfortunate Coach Keenan saga, Gerry finds himself subbing at a tough inner city school.

2.title: Educational Assistant
2.plot: Gerry is assigned an educational assistant, Marty, who quickly becomes a new source of irritation in the classroom.

3.title: Wrestling for Love
3.plot: When Lisa asks Gerry to cover coaching duties for the upcoming wrestling tournament, Gerry promises to bring home two trophies.

4.title: Gerry Runs a Sweatshop
4.plot: Gerry hatches a new "get rich quick" scheme selling counterfeit One Direction merchandise when he finds out the band is in town.

5.title: Re-Tired of Marking
5.plot: When Gerry is suddenly promoted from sub to full-time teacher, his initial thrill is quickly squashed by the realization that he's back to real teaching responsibilities.

6.title: Duncan vs. Bailey
6.plot: When Gerry learns that former Olympic champion Donovan Bailey is coming to town, he's determined to seek retribution for a long-standing bone he has with the track 'star.'

7.title: Student Teacher
7.plot: Gerry and Simon are both assigned student teachers. Gerry is thrilled to have a minion picking up the slack, while Simon is anxious about the added responsibility.

8.title: Gerry Wants a Union
8.plot: After Gerry has an unpleasant run-in with a unionized construction worker, he decides he wants to form a teachers union at Xavier.

9.title: Duncan Does Detention
9.plot: Gerry has big weekend plans for a fantasy baseball draft when he's told he has to cover Saturday detention.

10.title: Gerry Coaches Fencing
10.plot: Gerry's been given another coaching assignment, but this time he's helping Ricki prepare for a fencing tournament, and he couldn't be less interested.

11.title: Hell-icopter Mom
11.plot: When he attempts to reign in a bratty student, Gerry is faced with the wrath of his notoriously overprotective and obnoxious mother.

12.title: Out Cold
12.plot: Gerry accompanies students on a leadership retreat to a nature centre where he meets the beautiful staff member, Jasmine.

13.title: Gerry Turns 40
13.plot: Gerry is turning forty, and after finding a letter he wrote to himself ten years earlier, he becomes acutely aware of everything he has failed to accomplish.

8.title: Gerry Has Hot Sub Anxiety
8.plot: Gerry is blown away by the hotness of the new substitute teachers and sets his sights on 'hot-sub Mary,' the new love of his life. Meanwhile, Simon and Nisha gear up for their first kiss.

9.title: Busploitation
9.plot: When Gerry hears that a Kickstarter campaign raised money for a bullied bus monitor, he sets out to victimize himself in a similar fashion. Meanwhile, Dwyer has a new "killer" girlfriend and Bobbi comes to a surprising realization.

11.title: Gerry's Insder's Look
11.plot: A team of reporters uses Xavier Academy to determine the true value of private schools and ends up exposing a deep, dark secret.

locations: Citadel High School, Halifax, Nova Scotia, Canada
imdb.title: Mr. D
plot: Follows a teacher juggle through being a teacher and deal with his students while trying to maintain his not so cool lifestyle.
synopsis: Based on Gerry Dees real-life experiences as a high school teacher before he switched to comedy full-time, MR. D is a story about a charming, under-qualified teacher trying to fake his way through a teaching job, just like he often fakes his way through life. The premise shines the light on teaching from the teachers point of view, and as it turns out, teachers dont know everything, especially Mr. D who struggles to keep one step ahead of his students.
